readingMnemonic: The reading for 髪 isn't the one you learned. It's actually はつ, but it's getting rendaku'd here. So, to remember the reading of it for this word, just think about how if you were <vocabulary>blonde</vocabulary>, you'd wear many <reading>hats</reading> (はつ) to hide it. I have no idea why you'd hide it, but you can come up with a compelling reason that makes sense to you.
